Fix for "game will not start issue":

1) Go to Control Panel... Administrative Tools... Services
2) Set Windows Update Service to Automatic; Background Intelligent Transfer Service: Automatic
3) Download 32/64 bits Windows Live Sign-In Assistant (wllogin_64/32.msi)
4) Install it, it creates a new service called Windows Live service Sign-In assistant that needs to be set on Automatic too.
5) Launch the game, enjoy.

Fix for error during install (Error 0x80070641):

Activate Windows Installer

Widescreen fix :

C:\Users\YOURNAME\Documents\My Games\DiRT3\hardwaresettings

Right click "hardware_settings_config" and choose EDIT look for --> aspect="16:9" fullscreen="true" and change it to true if it says false etc etc
